title: Hellblade.Senuas.Sacrifice-RELOADED
description:
Hellblade Senua s Sacrifice (c) Ninja Theory
   
RELEASE.DATE: 08/2017
PROTECTION: Steam
DISC(S): 1
GAME.TYPE: Violent, Action, Adventure, Indie
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/414340/Hellblade_Senuas_Sacrifice/

From the makers of Heavenly Sword, Enslaved: Odyssey to the West,
 and DmC: Devil May Cry, comes a warrior?s brutal journey into myth and
 madness. Set in the Viking age, a broken Celtic warrior embarks on a haunting
 vision quest into Viking Hell to fight for the soul of her dead lover. 

Install


 1. Unrar.
 2. Burn or mount the image.
 3. Install the game. 
 4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
    your game install directory.
 5. Play the game.
 6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
